channel.title: Blitz project safezones

item.title: Blitz project safezones
item.dc:creator: @str_o_tek str o tek
item.description:
@str_o_tek wrote:

[quote=“gamerscape, post:1, topic:333449”]ok so i open my client.java search nonwild find it and get this:
public boolean nonWildPvP() {
if (absX >= 3204 && absX <= 3212 && absY >= 3218 && absY <= 3226)

			return true;
		} else {
			return false;
	}
}

thats how it was then i added my coords like this
public boolean nonWildPvP() {
if (absX >= 3204 && absX <= 3212 && absY >= 3218 && absY <= 3226)
if (absX >= 2000 && absX <= 2500 && absY >= 3000 && absY <= 3500) {

			return true;
		} else {
			return false;
	}
}

and i get this error

client.java:497: missing statment
}
1 error
finished!
press any key to continue…

please help me via ry4n-wr1ght@hotmail.com or reply to this[/quote]
0MG dont u kno anytin about coding -.- after an ‘if’ there always needs to be an { to start the expression.

or, just put || between, like this:

      if (absX >= 3204 && absX <= 3212 && absY >= 3218 && absY <= 3226) || (absX >= 2000 && absX <= 2500 && absY >= 3000 && absY <= 3500) {
      
            return true;
         } else {
            return false;
      }
   }

and it should work.
I hope you learn something from this

Read full topic
